{"id":1523612669,"question_id":695,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"3 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1738090255,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"31 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1523612669/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"19.6 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxAreaOfIsland(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        rows,cols=len(grid),len(grid[0])\n        area=0\n        visit=set()\n\n\n        def dfs(r,c):\n            if r<0 or c<0 or r==rows or c==cols or grid[r][c]==0 or (r,c) in visit:\n                return 0\n\n            visit.add((r,c))\n            return (1+dfs(r-1,c)+dfs(r+1,c)+dfs(r,c-1)+dfs(r,c+1))\n        for r in range(rows):\n            for c in range(cols):\n                area=max(area,dfs(r,c))\n\n        return area","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
